About Me

My Introduction

I am an aspiring Front-end Developer with hands-on experience in React.js development, and a taste for creative interface design. I have proficient skills in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS including pre-processors such as SASS/SCSS and React.js and Redux.
I also have expertise in file conversion and automating stuff using Python.
Open to front-end, full-stack development roles and look to deliver on expectations!
